participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Reflective and expressive, she often shares her feelings openly and tends to be sensitive to her surroundings.
participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Bobby
participant_2.personality: Playful and curious, he loves to explore new things and express himself through songs and games.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i am four years old.
